name: Thinking Toxic
description:
Game Jam Entry for Mini Jam 129 - Poison

You have stolen the princesses of 6 different noble houses. Now their knights are giving chase, following you into your neck of the woods where you will make your stand!

How to Play:

Luckily you have concocted specialised poisons, color coded for each noble house. Pair your poison bottles in groups of three by clicking on one, and dragging it into the desired Direction.

Then coordinate your attack by selecting a poison slot (numbers 1-5), followed by the starting letter of the corresponding poison colors, blue, green, orange, purple, yellow or red. Press the Shoot Button, or the Spacebar to release your deadly posion vials. 

It is important, that you match the right poison to the approaching knight, as they seem immune to the poison of the wrong colour.  

If you ever struggle to find matching pairs, you can press the shuffle button. Be warned tough, as you will spill all your previously collected poison by doing so!
